Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a a train near Austin Congress. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a a train near Austin Congress. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
